components.name: 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium tetrafluoroborate
sample: 98 mol %(de-gassed by freezing and melting in vacuum;dried in a desiccator)

ref.title: Volumetric and Acoustic Properties of Binary Mixtures of the Ionic Liquid 1-Butyl-3-methylimidazolium Tetrafluoroborate [bmim][BF4] with Alkoxyalkanols at Different Temperatures
ref.full: Pal, A.; Kumar, B. (2012) J. Chem. Eng. Data 57(3), 688-695.
